title: Hiring For Zoho Developer in Navi Mumbai
jobDescription:
We are Immediately hiring for Zoho Developer in Navi Mumbai 


About Company

Clover Infotech is a leading global IT services and consulting company with a strong presence in Mumbai. The company provides solutions and services across application and technology modernization, cloud enablement, data management, automation, and assurance services. Clover Infotech is a long-standing Oracle Partner with extensive experience in implementing and managing Oracle Fusion Applications and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI). The company has worked with customers across industries and has successfully migrated businesses to OCI without disruption.

Job description

Job Location: Navi Mumbai


Job Overview:

  • We are seeking a talented Zoho Developer with a minimum of 3-4 years of experience to design, develop, and maintain applications within the Zoho suite.
  • The ideal candidate will have strong technical skills, a passion for problem-solving, and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.






Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop custom Zoho applications to meet business needs.
  • Integrate Zoho applications with third-party systems.
  • Customize and optimize Zoho CRM Plus modules to enhance workflow and user experience.
  • Create and maintain workflows, functions, and API integrations within Zoho.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues within the Zoho platform.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand requirements and deliver effective solutions.
  • Stay updated with the latest features and updates within the Zoho ecosystem.






Required Qualifications:

  • Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent.
  • Minimum of 3-4 years of experience working as a Zoho Developer.
  • Proficiency in Zoho Creator, Zoho CRM Plus modules and other Zoho applications.
  • Strong understanding of Deluge Script.
  • Experience with API integrations and webhooks.
  • Familiarity with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other web technologies.
  • Ability to design and implement custom applications and solutions.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
  • Ability to work effectively in a team environment and independently.






If Interested please share resume on swapna.gupta@cloverinfotech.com along with following details
Total Experience :-

Zoho Creator (in years)
Zoho CRM Plus modules(in years)

title: iOS Developer - Bengaluru Location
jobDescription:
Strong communication skills. Proficiency in Swift programming language. Experience with both Storyboard and SwiftUI for UI design.

Familiarity with Apollo GraphQL for backend integration. Knowledge of Realm database for local data storage.

Experience working with iOS apps with multiple targets.Understanding of localization concepts.

Proficiency in XCTest framework for unit testing. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Proven work experience as an iOS Developer, 4to 6 years of hands-on experience in iOS application development. Strong proficiency in Swift programming language. In-depth knowledge of iOS frameworks such as UIKit, Core Data, Core Animation, etc.

Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, and web services integration. Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows (e.g., Agile, Scrum).

Solid understanding of software development principles, mobile application architecture, and design patterns.

Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code, following coding standards and best practices.

Experience with debugging, performance profiling, and optimization techniques.

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to work effectively in a collaborative environment.

Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and committed to delivering high-quality products.

Strong organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

Experience with publishing iOS applications to the App Store is a plus.
